page.title: 06OUR TEACHERS.
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED ALL THE TEACHERS IN BLACK COMBE SCHOOL. MOST TEACHERS COME TO SCHOOL BETWEEN 8.10 AND 8.30 AND WENT HOME AT 5.00.ALL OF THE TEACHERS SAID THEY ENJOYED BEING A TEACHER IN THIS SCHOOL .THE TEACHERS CLASSES HAD 23 TO 30 CHILDREN IN THEM. THE MOST NUMBER OF YEARS THAT THE TEACHERS HAVE WORKED HERE IS 14 .NOT ALL OF THE TEACHERS HAVE JUST WORKED IN A JUNIOR SCHOOL ALL OF THE TIME. SOME OF THE TEACHERS WALK TO SCHOOL AND SOME COME BY CAR.NOT ALL OF THE TEACHERS RUN A CLUB ONLY HALF, AND HALF OF THEM DON'T.MR DRIVER THE HEADMASTER COMES TO SCHOOL IN A CAR. ALL TOGETHER THERE ARE 211 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL.HERE ARE SOME OF THE CLUBS.TENNIS ,GYM BADMINTON,DRAMA,CHESS,TABLE TENNIS, ATHLETICS, ROUNDERS AND FOOTBALL. THE CARETAKER IS MR MC KNIGHT.
